alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Norman County through 345 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ada, or 29 miles north of Fargo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ada, Lockhart and Hadler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
